attributes.action: Carers allowance raised to cover loss of wages
attributes.additional_details: They have cut on welfare benefits this should be increased to reward carers
attributes.background: Raise Carers allowance to reflect the savings made on social care

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign the following petition, which calls for action on the same issue: 

Increase Carer's Allowance to equal minimum wage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700028
